questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Roadwork and traffic signs
D) Wildlife and animals

B) On a beach
C) On a grassy roadside
D) Inside a museum

B) Red and white

B) Right

D) Down
